a=[	0,1, 2, 2, 4, 8, 12, 96, 108, 10368, 10476, 108615168, 108625644, 11798392572168192, 11798392680793836, 139202068568601556987554268864512, 139202068568601568785946949658348]
a.append(a[16]*a[15])
a.append(a[17]+a[16])
a.append(a[18]*a[17])
a.append(a[19]+a[18])
for _ in range(input()):
	n=input()
	print a[n]
